page.content:
Foxhunter Chase Race Card

The Foxhunter Chase Race Card is the one after the Gold Cup so and is a decent betting event despite the fact it is always a tough one for punters to pick over. The Race Card should be the first port of call for any Foxhunter Chase punter and it will include all the info on each of the runners in the race. The betting for the race will also be on offer as well the details of each of the Jockeys and trainers.

Foxhunter Chase Race Card
